brief_title: Study of Aripiprazole in Subjects With Alcoholism
brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to learn whether subjects treated with aripiprazole are able to abstain from alcohol use for a greater number of days than subjects treated with placebo. The safety of using aripiprazole will also be studied.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Subjects with a diagnosis of alcohol dependence who want to stop using alcohol will be considered for the study.
